page.title: 04FARMING 3
page.content: { {The Farmers year In the {spring}the farmers repair fences and walls and prepare the fields for grazing.They harrow, roll and till the land. Also lambing. In {summer}their main job is collecting sufficient green grass which can be made into silage for winter feeding. Also collecting hay. During the {late summer}and{autumn} the cattle are calving. This is the time also for reseeding, altering and repairing buildings. The{winter}months are spent looking after the animals which are mainly indoors.
